means: 华而不实的小件装饰品

sentence.Network_en: Afool should never hold a bauble in his hand.

sentence.Network_cn: 丑角挥动手中拿着的木棒.

sentence.Network_en: The child was delighted with the bauble she had won in the grab bag.
sentence.Network_cn: 这孩子非常喜欢摸彩袋赢得的那个小玩意儿.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 玩具类的英语单词有哪些?_百度知道 ... fancy toy 益智玩具 bauble 小玩意儿 knickknack 小玩意儿.
中国香港买家 -76... ... 相关买家: 聚合氯化铝; PAC; 相关买家: 玩具; Bauble; 相关买家: 圣诞树; christmas tree.
GRE 词汇表(红宝书) - 豆丁网 ... baton n. 指挥棒,警棍 bauble n. 廉价珠宝 bauxite n. 铝土岩(产铝的矿土、石).
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(B) ... batwing 似蝙蝠翼的 bauble 华而不实物 bauchle 无用之物.

list.abs: The shop sells baubles as well ., 这家商店也销售廉价珠宝.
The clothing category also includes jewelry and similar baubles ., 服饰大类也包括珠宝与类似的小玩意.
that little bauble is not to be compared with ( not to ) this enormous jewel.But to is frequently used in this context and is not incorrect .那个小摆设不能与（不是to)这个大宝石相比较。但to常用于此上下文，也是正确的
Fell on the ground , has become greatly a bauble ;, 有的落在地面上 , 成为大地的一件装饰品;

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : from Old French baubel 'child's toy', of unknown origin

entry.def: A bauble is a small, cheap ornament or piece of jewellery.

example.tran: 缀满各色小饰物的圣诞树

means.word_mean: 1. a mock scepter carried by a court jester
2. cheap showy jewelry or ornament on clothing

auth_sentence.content: It is a paltry cap,...a bauble, a silken pie.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is a paltry cap,...a bauble, a silken pie.
